ej,starh101,C,harvd901,Fighting ej,lacyl001,P,harvd901,Fighting $Bert Blyleven picked up the ball and charged the mound; he was restrained by catcher Bob Boone; both benches cleared; the fight seemed to have stopped when it restarted with Phillies bullpen coach Mike Ryan in the middle; Lee Lacy and Phillies Coach Herm Starrette ejected by HP umpire Doug Harvey

ej,brisd801,M,grege901,Call at 2B ej,mcmad102,C,grege901,Call at 2B $Lonnie Smith beat throw to 2B on attempted double play but walked off the bag thinking he was out; Smith was tagged but 2B umpire Eric Gregg had called time, so Smith was not out; Giants manager Dave Bristol and pitching coach Don McMahon ejected by Gregg; Giants played game under protest
$Tug McGraw was trying to intentionally walk Joe Ferguson when Ferguson reached out and singled

ej,russb001,P,mcshj901,Fight after HBP ej,lasot101,M,mcshj901,Fight after HBP $Tug McGraw angry that Joe Ferguson hit an intentional ball for a single so McGraw intentionally hit Bill Russell; Russell charged the mound and was ejected by 2B umpire John McSherry; Dodgers Manager Tom Lasorda argued that McGraw should be ejected and was ejected by McSherry
